ValidationRule.description: Once a WES credit analyst has begun working on an Application, they can't move the application status backwards to Awaiting credit check.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $User.Role_Name__c = "WES Credit Vetting Analyst", TEXT(Application_Status__c) = "Awaiting Credit Check", ISCHANGED(Application_Status__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You can not change the Application Status to "Awaiting Credit Check". You must get your manager's assistance to make this change.
